Title: Prohibits street takeovers and sideshows
Summary: Prohibits street takeovers and sideshows; imposes imprisonment of not more than six months, a fine of one thousand dollars, or both such fine and imprisonment for a violation of such prohibition.
LawCode: Add ยง1183, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting street takeovers and sideshows
